channel.title: J-scape 24-7 VPS
channel.description:
Website: http://J-Scape.tk Download client on forums 24/7 VPS with 4gb ram
100% Shops fixed price and etc. -Almost 100% SOF added (other than the common cache problem with the images screwing up), Stuff like "You recieved (items name)", All working Rarities. -All Dominion Glove Specials Work (Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts) -Full GWD (Including Nex and Nex Drops the new Nex Boots and Gloves!) -KING BLACK DRAGON JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE (You will love this feature) -Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides. -New Saradomin Amulets (Whisper, Murmur and Hiss) and Godwars Items (Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl's Crossbow, Armadyl's Buckler -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!) -Revenants and Glacors with working Drops (Pvp Armours for Revs) (Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors) -Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.) -Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc. -All 735+ Monsters such as Nex, Godwars, All of that good stuff (with 100% working NEW coords for Godwars Plus 100% Working Godwar altars.) -It has some fixed Mod, Admin and Owner crowns. (Use a cache Editor to change them) -718 Drop Editor -An Eco-Reset Batch file -Xteas are phenomenal, only very few places are missing -Home is at pest control -Pvp System with Pvp shop -A completely CUSTOM Ganodermic shop (Kill Gano Beasts for flakes and turn them in as a reward with the Ogre trader for equipment) -Announcement when Owner signs on (for you self centered coders, just change the name from ben to whatever your owner name will be) And now my favorite feature/features would be logs. Yes, logs. I have added chat logs for ANY player (staff or not). Command logs (For all ranks). Ip logs (to keep an eye on your "trusted" players more closely). And Trade logs (Not Fully Fixed but works)

item.title: J-scape 24-7 VPS
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. No Media.

  2. A wall of text will turn some potential Players away.

  3. Nothing new or out of the ordinary here.

Read full topic

item.title: J-scape 24-7 VPS
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

Website: http://J-Scape.tk
Download client on forums
24/7 VPS with 4gb ram

100% Shops fixed price and etc.
-Almost 100% SOF added (other than the common cache problem with the images screwing up), Stuff like “You recieved (items name)”, All working Rarities.
-All Dominion Glove Specials Work (Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts)
-Full GWD (Including Nex and Nex Drops the new Nex Boots and Gloves!)
-KING BLACK DRAGON JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE (You will love this feature)
-Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides.
-New Saradomin Amulets (Whisper, Murmur and Hiss) and Godwars Items (Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl’s Crossbow, Armadyl’s Buckler
-Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!)
-Revenants and Glacors with working Drops (Pvp Armours for Revs) (Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors)
-Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.)
-Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc.
-All 735+ Monsters such as Nex, Godwars, All of that good stuff (with 100% working NEW coords for Godwars Plus 100% Working Godwar altars.)
-It has some fixed Mod, Admin and Owner crowns. (Use a cache Editor to change them)
-718 Drop Editor
-An Eco-Reset Batch file
-Xteas are phenomenal, only very few places are missing
-Home is at pest control
-Pvp System with Pvp shop
-A completely CUSTOM Ganodermic shop (Kill Gano Beasts for flakes and turn them in as a reward with the Ogre trader for equipment)
-Announcement when Owner signs on (for you self centered coders, just change the name from ben to whatever your owner name will be)
And now my favorite feature/features would be logs. Yes, logs. I have added chat logs for ANY player (staff or not). Command logs (For all ranks). Ip logs (to keep an eye on your “trusted” players more closely). And Trade logs (Not Fully Fixed but works)

Read full topic
